goal:
The law firm is involved in regular practice ( civil and commercial) , but over time we have obtained better results in lobbying on specific cases rather than managing them before national Courts.

Accordingly , many issues concerning EU laws have been succesfully resolved before Solvit and the EU Commission within a very short period of time , sometimes evenn faster than ordinary Court claims.

We have been focused mostly on professional qualification issues , but we have been active even in matters of transport social security and taxation.
